channel.title: Moparscape and Moparisthebest?

item.title: Moparscape and Moparisthebest?
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

[quote=“wales 00, post:11, topic:295373”][quote author=Envion link=topic=390654.msg2917622#msg2917622 date=1250552819]

The question has been answered.

They share a database, that is all.

They must manually edit the php files to use the same prefix as well.

roflwat
[/quote]
post.php
calendar.php

Files like that must have the same prefix, otherwise they won’t work.

http://www.simplemachines.org/community/index.php?topic=16190.0[/quote]
ya you are wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape and Moparisthebest?
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

wat

[quote=“Serinity, post:661, topic:249774”]i cannot log into the server it says “server down” or something please help?!!! :’(
[center] This is not a help thread or anything of the sort; do not misuse this thread.[/center][/quote]

[quote=“Boon3”]Hey.
When im shutdown mu computer my server goes offline so noone can log into it, anyone no how to fix it so it dosent go offline when i shutdown my computer?

Plz help Thanks[/quote]

[quote=“the1337legend, post:3, topic:295775”]You need to replace your cache, or just use a different npc. And as stated, yes it’s a Ags(Armadyl Godsword) special.

To replace the cache simply download a new one or get it from a different client, copy and replace it on yours.[/quote]

Paying for private servers and more

HA! Now I can e-mail Jagex! You can’t earn money with something what’s not your idea. It’s Jagex his idea. Bye bye moparscape!

Paying for private servers and more

I do think one thing that most programmers dont understand. Do you know how close to impossible it is to crossover two languages? Code a server in C++ and have the client run on java? No its not happening. Stretching java to its limits? No all you have to do for the login procedure is make the best socket to thread runner you can. But as to the C++ I HIGHLY doubt it. You show me a server written and C that runs off of a java applet. and i will bow down. I mean yes its possible because we know jagex does it, but the way private servers are written now…you would have to reconfigure a whole heck of a lot…i just have doubts. I wish all luck.

Paying for private servers and more

i cant figure out how i can compile my own server

Complaints about staff

Rich muted my old account because i had too many topics rofl!!! hes a fuckin nerd.

Now… take a look at www.moparisthebest.com

Read full topic

@wales_00 wrote:

Miss Silabsoft:

moparisthebest.com and moparisthebest.com was originally just 1 site. However an influx of morons started causing the Leet people to get upset and the sites seperated into two categories. So they only share a minor relation.

This is why moparscape is now full of idiots.
